title: Natural gas burns cleaner than oil

content.prompt: An advantage of using natural gas, rather than oil, as a fuel is that natural gas is

choices.label: less of a contributor to global warming because it does not release CO2 when it burns
less expensive because most reserves are in the United States
more abundant because it is a by-product of photosynthesis
safer to store because it is a gas

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
